item.title: CVE-2022-3464|2024-08-03T01:07:06.640Z -- unspecified -- puppycms
item.description: A vulnerability classified as problematic has been found in puppyCMS up to 5.1. This affects an unknown part of the file /admin/settings.php. The manipulation of the argument site_name leads to cross site scripting. It is possible to initiate the attack remotely. The associated identifier of this vulnerability is VDB-210699.
